verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: broadsided] [ARG1: his allies] and upended a Group of Seven meeting just as it wound up -- disavowing a joint statement the U.S. had agreed to , lashing out at Canada ’s Justin Trudeau and ratcheting up trade tensions .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] broadsided his allies and [V: upended] [ARG1: a Group of Seven meeting] [ARGM-TMP: just as it wound up] -- [ARGM-ADV: disavowing a joint statement the U.S. had agreed to , lashing out at Canada ’s Justin Trudeau and ratcheting up trade tensions] .
